comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "GETTING POINTERS - Three candidates for berths on the 1957 Florida A and M University High School Baby Rattlers football team receive pointers from Coach Clarence Montgomery (kneeling). Standing, left to right, Robert Paramore, fullback; Ralph Monroe, halfback, and John Blair, halfback."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
